message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?

I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $130. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product.
I appreciate the compromise, but $130 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. I can offer it to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product. It's a win-win!
I'm getting close, but $125 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer it to you for $118. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value of this product.
I'm really close, but I think I can do better. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we've reached a good compromise. I can offer it to you for $117. It's the best I can do.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $110. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $80.
